name: Revelation UO Emulator
short_description:
The Revelation UO Emulator is a free Ultima-Online emulator based on Nox-Wizard.
It is designed to be C-user-Friendly for scripting (using smallscript), newbie-friendly for maintenance, and compatible with all requested platforms.
